sentence: And when Cawthorn attended a Wednesday night fundraiser for Harriet Hageman, Rep. Liz Cheney's primary challenger, his own GOP colleagues spent some of the fundraiser, feet away, quietly joking at his expense, according to people in the room,? Politico's Olivia Beavers reports.
author: Laura Clawson
title: Republicans aren't happy Madison Cawthorn spilled the beans about cocaine orgies

sentence: You have to earn them," said Stefanik, who is backing Cheney's primary challenger in Wyoming, Harriet Hageman.
author: Marisa Schultz
title: Elise Stefanik says Republicans are on track to win 'a historic majority'
